params.revocable: Whether the schedule can be revoked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.scheduleId: The schedule ID to release from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createVestingSchedule(address,uint256,ui.notice: Create a vesting schedule for a beneficiary

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal of tokens (only unused tokens)

getAllVestingSchedules(address).notice: Get all vesting schedules for a beneficiary

getVestingSummary(address).notice: Get comprehensive vesting summary for a beneficiary

releasableAmount(address,uint256).notice: Calculate releasable amount for a schedule

release(address,uint256).notice: Release vested tokens for a specific schedule

releaseAll(address).notice: Release all available tokens for all schedules of a beneficiary

revoke(address,uint256).notice: Revoke a vesting schedule (only if revocable)

totalReleasableAmount(address).notice: Get total releasable amount for all schedules of a beneficiary

vestedAmount(address,uint256).notice: Calculate total vested amount for a schedule at current time
